name: Steven Capell, Director at GoSource Pty Ltd
description: Jorgihno joined a very complex and high pressure project mid-flight and came up to speed very quickly. He delivered high quality code very efficiently. He's an independent thinker that sees issues and fixes them without needing to be told. We loved working with Jorgihno and look forward to our next project with him.

name: Adam Fernandez, Founder at Equedi
description: Jorgihno is a fantastic full stack developer. He writes clean, well documented code and is always looking for new ways to solve problems. I highly recommend Jorgihno if you need a top notch developer, you wonâ€™t go wrong!

name: Yogesh Srihari, Co-Founder/CEO at YOLORekt
description: Jorgihno is fantastic! He is very knowledgeable and skilled and a great communicator. He works hard and takes pride in his work. I hope to work with him more in the future and would highly recommend him for your website projects.

name: Kieran Derfus, Product Manager @ Framework Labs
description: Jorgihno was great to work with and he stepped in to help us out with some of our requirements for web components that he was creating for us. He was willing to work at helping us define some of the interfaces which saved a lot of time on our end in terms of project requirements. He communicated clearly, worked to meet our deadlines and was a pleasure to work, and we hope to work with him again.

name: Isaac Squires, CEO at Human Program
description: Jorgihno is a talented developer who is eager to learn and improve. His code quality was not completely up to my standards initially. I don't really give second chances normally but he really stepped up his game so fast that I didn't have to terminate the contract early! I will continue working with him on many other projects.

name: Parsa Shabani, Founder at Fitforce LTD
description: Jorginho is awesome: he's reponsive, self-thinking, made suggestions on his own and even researched additional options. He delivered absolutely clean code - highly recommend!

name: Adel Bakhtiarova, CEO at Fathom Radiant
description: Jorgihno made a website for our company from scratch in Next js - it is a beautiful website, fast and quality work. He is very great at communicating and delivers what he says. Very knowledgable, and smart. It was a pleasure to work with him.

name: Jack Misteli, Founder of Manage My Power
description: Jorgihno is a great communicator, very knowledgeable developer and comes up with creative solutions to problems. He works very hard and can work very quickly. It was a pleasure working with him.

name: Founder @ Terrain Digital
description: Jorgihno was quick to engage on the project, did very well with all React based component milestones. Was able to grasp the codebase, and operate within the confines of the project. He stuck to schedule, was reactive to feedback, and overall did a good job.
